titleStmt.title: The scourge of securitie, or The expulsion and returne of the vncleane spirit. By William Est, minister and preacher of Gods word, at Bedford in Deuonshire
titleStmt.author: Est, William, 1546 or 7-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T[homas] C[reede] for Thomas Downe, and Ephraim Dauson, and are to be solde at their shop in Fleete-streete, at the Inner Temple-gate,

notesStmt.note: Cf. Folger catalogue, which give signatures: A⁴ B-G H⁴ (-H3).
Reproduction of the original in the Princeton Theological Seminary. Library.

place.placeName: their shop in Fleete-streete, at the Inner Temple-gate
